item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.8.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2022 23:59:45 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.12.3
- Give simulation mode its own port number

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.3.10
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.3.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2022 21:05:45 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: - Issue #63: Implement arbitrary sweep table support.
- Rudimentary tables can be created inside the UI (e.g., [0,1,2,0])
- More complicated arbitrary waveforms can be loaded via the API "setSweepTable" method
- Issue #64: implement output sampling rate to avoid memory overflow errors during sweep mode
- Issue #65: better support for USB-4431 Devices
- Fix issues with measuring offset; updated notch filter
- Updated waveguide model (AI1 gain)
- Miscellaneous bugfixes and UI improvements

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013 (32 bit / x86)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
